title: Fidelity Starts Crypto Business, Consumer’s Curiosity About Cannabis, Sears Says So Long
itunes:title: Fidelity Starts Crypto Business, Consumer’s Curiosity About Cannabis, Sears Says So Long
description:
Tom Jessop, Head of Corporate Business Development and Digital Assets at Fidelity Investments, discusses jumping into the emerging cryptocurrency arena with a new business to manage digital assets for hedge funds, family offices and trading firms. Greg Portell, Partner at A.T. Kearney, talks about business opportunities for legalized cannabis. Burt Flickinger, Managing Director at Strategic Resource Group, breaks down how Sears wound up filing for bankruptcy. And we Drive to the Close of the market with David Dietze, President and Chief Investment Strategist at Point View Wealth Management.

 Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
